title: 2020 Nissan Titan and Titan XD PRO-4X Have Cool Red Nissan Badges and Accents
text:
From Car and Driver

The lava red badge is located on the front grille, steering wheel, wheel center caps, and rear tailgate.

The Titan and Titan XD are both powered by a revised 5.7-liter V-8 paired with a nine-speed automatic transmission.

PRO-4X models also included red stitching, camo-like inserts and PRO-4X engravings on the seats, a lava-red Nissan badge on the steering wheel, and a red-accented gauge cluster.

The 2020 Nissan Titan and Titan XD have fresh new faces with larger, bolder grilles that are special for each trim level. The PRO-4X models have an all black front grille with an all-new Lava Red Nissan badge. The red badge is also found on the wheel center caps and the black tailgate.

Nissan says that this is the first time that one of their trucks has sported red-accented badges from the factory. The PRO-4X models also feature red stitching, camo-like inserts and PRO-4X engravings on the seats, a lava-red Nissan badge on the steering wheel, and a red-accented gauge cluster.

Photo credit: Connor Hoffman - Car and Driver More

Four exterior colors are also exclusive to the Titan XD: Red Alert, Baja Storm, Cardinal Red Metallic, and Super Black. Nissan also told us that an accessory package featuring what they call a “sport bar” with a light bar on top and lava red-accented steps could become available through dealers for PRO-4X models.

Pricing for the Titan and Titan XD PRO4-X hasn’t been announced yet, but we can expect it to be close to $47,000 for the Titan and just a touch more for the Titan XD. Both models will be available early 2020 sporting that sweet new Nissan badge.
